entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Snow level 2100 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Snow level rising to 1900 metres in the morning. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow level 2000 metres lowering to valley bottom in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023
